g++   -fpermissive -std=c++0x -Wall -O3 -lm -DNSDEBUG   CMakeFiles/TestReset.dir/TestReset.cpp.o CMakeFiles/TestReset.dir/TestResetMain.cpp.o  -o TestReset  -L/lib64/libhwloc.so -rdynamic ../../../../src/runtime/libdarts.a ../../../../src/abstractmachine/libamm.a -lhwloc ../../../../src/rsmanager/librsmanager.a ../../../../src/common/libcommon.a -lpthread ../../../../src/threading/libcodelet.a ../../../../src/scheduler/libscheduler.a ../../../../src/threadlocal/libthreadlocal.a -lrt -ltbb -Wl,-rpath,/lib64/libhwloc.so
